overview: A ruthless assassin's plan is interrupted when she discovers that the man she needs to kill has more to hide than expected. Her life unravels as she must juggle her new priorities with her inner demons. Set in a world where violence rules over virtue, she must face the hardest realityâ€“is she the real danger or the monsters that control the criminal underworld?
tagline: Life is precious. Never kill for free.
title: Watch Me Kill
